members.name: getIdentifier
members.comment: This attribute is used for the identifier of the counter.

members.name: getListStyle
members.comment: This attribute is used for the style of the list.

members.name: getSeparator
members.comment: This attribute is used for the separator of the nested counters.

name: org.w3c.dom.css.Counter
comment:
The Counter interface is used to represent any counter or counters function value. This interface reflects the values in the underlying style property.

See also the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification.
